project.description: Downloads and imports LetsEncrypt root certs to trust store.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
curl https://letsencrypt.org/certs/isrgrootx1.der -o isrgrootx1.der curl https://letsencrypt.org/certs/lets-encrypt-r3.der -o lets-encrypt-r3.der
keytool -import -keystore /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/application.truststore -storepass password -noprompt -trustcacerts -alias letsencryptauthority1 -file isrgrootx1.der keytool -import -keystore /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/application.truststore -storepass password -noprompt -trustcacerts -alias letsencryptauthority2 -file lets-encrypt-r3.der
